rainfalls: As of today, there is no Heavy Rainfall Warning Issued.
thunderstorms:
Thunderstorm Advisory No. 34 #NCR_PRSD

Issued at: 2:10 AM, 11 July 2025(Friday)



Moderate to heavy rainshowers with lightning and strong winds are expected over Metro Manila, Cavite, Batangas, Pampanga and Zambales within the next 3 hours.



The above conditions are being experienced in Bulacan(Malolos, Bulakan, Guiguinto, Balagtas, Bocaue) and Bataan(Orion, Limay) which may persist within 2 hours and may affect nearby areas.



All are advised to take precautionary measures against the impacts associated with these hazards which include flash floods and landslides.



Keep monitoring for updates.
